definitions.definition: The act or process of disenchanting or freeing from a false belief or illusion.
The state of being freed from a constructed or imposed illusion; the recognition of an underlying truth previously obscured by a false or controlled narrative.

main_definition: ( countable ) The act or process of disenchanting or freeing from a false belief or illusion.
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable ) The state of being freed from a constructed or imposed illusion; the recognition of an underlying truth previously obscured by a false or controlled narrative.
